tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: Did you know U.S. diplomatic officers responded to unprecedented challenges as they protected U.S. citizens & facilitated humanitarian relief efforts during World War I? Learn more about these #HeroesofUSDiplomacy here: go.usa.gov/xp3FN
